name: Relocation Of Outer Terrestrial Species
description:
Welcome to your job at the Relocation Of Outer Terrestrial Species. 

Our mission is to find new homes for galactic migrants. Our database has over 8,923,351,628,423,258 planets and counting.

Aliens will come to you for relocation. They will talk to you and you will have a chance to read their profiles. 

  • Empathize with them.
    • Listen to them.
    • Read about their species.
  • Think hard about what they need to live a good life somewhere else.

You must scan the cosmos, one planet at a time, until you find their new perfect home.

  • Click anywhere on the galaxy to bring up a planet profile.
  • Find the planet of their dreams.
  • Launch the aliens towards their new life.

We take pride in helping our clients plant their roots across the galaxy. Do not rush things. Our clients expect a perfect world suited to their tastes.

And management doesn't like answering complaints.

Once aliens settle in their new home, maybe they will reach out to let you know how it went.
